comments:
Build ID: M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
When trying to perform a QueryDocumentsGet using the bridge with registry: http://129.6.24.109:9080/axis2/services/xdsregistrya and documentID: 1.2.3.4.100000022002209036.1196211173506.1, we get the following response from the registry:

Error message(s) are:

More information:

We have reproduced this but believe it's a bug in the NIST registry.  

Please see this bug:  http://ihe.univ-rennes1.fr/flyspray/?do=details&id=187

We will keep this one open for now just in case.

Per private email, NIST will not fix their server to support the SQL query we are sending.  As a result, we have modified our query to appease NIST.  Fix out in the next build.  This should allow MESA test 11927 and others to pass.
